description: This file is an HTML document that serves as the front-end interface for a database visualization tool. It includes HTML structure, embedded CSS styles for layout and styling, and JavaScript code that handles dynamic data fetching, user interactions like selecting databases and tables, and rendering database content in tabular form.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates and inserts HTML for a data table based on fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, large text, and null values.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for wide text or objects.
